Rule.Name: Microsoft_AI_DirectML
Rule.Description: Options for the Microsoft.AI.DirectML NuGet Package

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_AI_DirectML_SkipLibraryCopy
BoolProperty.Description: Disables copying DirectML.dll and DirectML.pdb into the project output directory.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_AI_DirectML_SkipDebugLayerCopy
BoolProperty.Description: Disables copying DirectML.Debug.dll and DirectML.Debug.pdb into the project output directory. This 'debug layer' is used for development only.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_AI_DirectML_SkipLink
BoolProperty.Description: Disables linking with the package's import library appending the package's lib folder as an additional library directory.

BoolProperty.Name: Microsoft_AI_DirectML_SkipIncludeDir
BoolProperty.Description: Disables appending the package's include folder as an additional include directory.
